name: $lockedDate
desc: Returns: The Locked Date is  the effective date that is used to determine the version of all referenced Code Systems and Value Set Definitions included in the compose that are not already tied to a specific version.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The Locked Date is  the effective date that is used to determine the version of all referenced Code Systems and Value Set Definitions included in the compose that are not already tied to a specific version.

name: $inactive
desc: Returns: Whether inactive codes - codes that are not approved for current use - are in the value set. If inactive = true, inactive codes are to be included in the expansion, if inactive = false, the inactive codes will not be included in the expansion. If absent, the behavior is determined by the implementation, or by the applicable $expand parameters (but generally, inactive codes would be expected to be included).

pvardefs.name: pValue

name: $include
desc: Returns: Include one or more codes from a code system or other value set(s).

name: $addinclude
desc: Include one or more codes from a code system or other value set(s).

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Include one or more codes from a code system or other value set(s).
